entry.title: Photos Post 27: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Crowns' galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form the first 28 galleries of the folder Permanent Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 83
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 18 Photos of the special event 2003-1107 Evening Program, CA, U.S.A. have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 18 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 18 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 2003.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 82
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 7 Photos of the special event 1987-0815 Departure to Chartres Cathedral, Entrance to an Apartment Building, France have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 7 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1987.
[Note: one Photo was uploaded only on 2024-0120.]
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 79
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 2002-0800 Arrival, NJ, U.S.A. have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 low resolution from the Named Collections and 3 low resolutions from the XYZ Unknown Collection.
The direct link to the 4 Photos in the smallest gallery: U.S.A. 2002.
The event has as well 1 photo Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link U.S.A. Moments of Joy 1981 to 2003.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
